abilities.description: If you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.8d90dd472856be27]{Resupply} at night by sending your owl to hunt, take +2 momentum on a hit. When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.ed343c963b08f301]{Enter the Fray} +wits against an ambush in darkness, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
When you leverage your owl’s secret knowledge to perform a ritual, add +1 or take +1 momentum on a hit (decide before rolling).
When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.92b85c33a17ab487]{Face Death}, take your owl’s health as +momentum before you roll.
